post.title: 20 Best Paris Major 2023 Player Autograph Stickers - Hellcase Blog
post.excerpt: Paris stickers are here! BLAST.tv Paris Major 2023, the last CS:GO major in the history of the series, is slowly approaching, and fans worldwide finally got their hands on the tournament sticker capsules with participating team’s logos and players’ s
post.content_html:
Paris stickers are here! BLAST.tv Paris Major 2023, the last CS:GO major in the history of the series, is slowly approaching, and fans worldwide finally got their hands on the tournament sticker capsules with participating team’s logos and players’ signatures. In this overview, we will review the most creative and unique stickers from the Paris Major Autograph Capsule.

In article you will find:

  • What are Player Autograph Stickers?
  • How to Get Player Autograph Stickers?
  • Best Paris Player Autograph Stickers
  • m0NESY Autograph Sticker
  • s1mple Autograph Sticker
  • ropz Autograph Sticker
  • ZywOo Autograph Sticker
  • dexter Autograph Sticker
  • cadiaN Autograph Sticker
  • Floppy Autograph Sticker
  • jks Autograph Sticker
  • arT Autograph Sticker
  • siuhy Autograph Sticker
  • karrigan Autograph Sticker
  • npl Autograph Sticker
  • electroNic Autograph Sticker
  • somedieyoung Autograph Sticker
  • huNter Autograph Sticker
  • hades Autograph Sticker
  • SunPayus Autograph Sticker
  • WOOD7 Autograph Sticker
  • Grim Autograph Sticker
  • Sico Autograph Sticker
  • Wrapping Up!

What are Player Autograph Stickers?

Players’ Autograph Stickers are in-game collectible items that Valve had been releasing prior to every Major tournament, starting with ESL One: Cologne 2015 , and the upcoming one is not an exception.

Every player whose team qualifies for the Major gets an Autograph sticker. Although most players design their stickers themselves, Valve sometimes creates them. It happens if players make controversial entries unsuitable for release for various reasons.

Prior to Major, these stickers get sorted in capsules based on the stage of the Major the player qualifies for: Contenders, Challengers, and Legends. After the Grand Final concludes and the Major winner is determined, the Champions Sticker Capsules are also added to CS:GO with the victorious team logo and the players’ signatures.

How to Get Player Autograph Stickers?

You can buy and unbox a Paris 2023 Contenders, Challengers, or Legends Autograph Sticker Capsule to get Player Autograph Stickers. You do not need a key to open these capsules; they are obtainable from the game’s main menu, and you can get an infinite amount of them.

If you are not into opening containers or know precisely which Paris 2023 Autograph Sticker you want to add to your collection, you can head to Steam Community Market and purchase it from other users if there are active offers.

The only other way to acquire Paris 2023 Player Autograph Stickers is to get a Viewer Pass in-game, redeem or purchase a Souvenir Package, and unbox it. A weapon skin from the corresponding collection will drop with one pre-applied signature sticker. Remember that you can not remove this sticker and re-apply it to another weapon.

Best Paris Player Autograph Stickers

m0NESY Autograph Sticker

BLAST.tv Paris Major will be the second Major event in the professional career of G2’s Ilya “m0NESY” Osipov, and his Autograph Sticker is now the most expensive and well-liked one.
mONESY’s Paris Sticker features a crossed “O” to resemble the sniper rifle’s scope and a lightning motif to emphasize the reaction speed of the young talent.

s1mple Autograph Sticker

Oleksandr “s1mple” Kostyljev has been using the same design for his Player Autograph Sticker for a while, yet it is still eye-catching.

ropz Autograph Sticker

FaZe Clan’s player Robin “ropz” Kool depicted a broken heart on his Paris 2023 Autograph Sticker.

ZywOo Autograph Sticker

Mathieu “ZywOo” Herbaut changed his nickname to ZyWHO and added a question mark at the end of his signature to match it with the popular meme.

dexter Autograph Sticker

While being controversial, the Paris Autograph Sticker of Christopher “dexter” Nong from MOUZ is one of the most well-liked in the community.

cadiaN Autograph Sticker

Heroic’s Casper “cadiaN” Møller is one of the best AWP players in the world, so it is not surprising that he used a sniper motif on his signature sticker. Looks great!

Floppy Autograph Sticker

sus.

jks Autograph Sticker

Justin “jks” Savage has a really savage Paris 2023 Autograph Sticker. You can unbox it from the Challengers Autograph Capsule.

arT Autograph Sticker

Having such an “artistic” nickname, it is unsurprising that Andrei “arT” Piovezan designed such a creative sticker.

siuhy Autograph Sticker

Kamil “siuhy” Szkaradek from Gamer Legion decided to depict a CS:GO chicken on his Paris 2023 Player Autograph Sticker.

karrigan Autograph Sticker

Do you remember FaZe Clan´s IGL Finn “karrigan” Andersen on the stage in a Batman mask? Well, it became a meme, and Finn delivered a great sticker to the community.

npl Autograph Sticker

Did you know that Andrij “npl” Kukharsjkyj used to perform for NAVI Junior as “nipl”? When he joined the main roster, he was forced to change his nickname due to the controversy. The young player.

electroNic Autograph Sticker

Denis “electroNic” Sharipov is NAVI’s in-game leader, and he used a high voltage icon on his Paris 2023 Paris Autograph Sticker.

somedieyoung Autograph Sticker

Viktor “sdy” Orudzhev is a Ukrainian player for Monte. He depicted a pulse pattern on his Paris Player Autograph Sticker.

huNter Autograph Sticker

Nemanja “huNter-” Kovač from G2 changed the “e” letter in his Paris Signature Sticker to a bow icon.

hades Autograph Sticker

Aleksander “hades” Miskiewicz from 9INE used a drawing of a small hat to decorate his Paris 2023 sticker.

SunPayus Autograph Sticker

ENCE’s Alvaro “SunPayus” Garcia decorated his Paris 2023 CS:GO Sticker with a drawn hand gesture and a scope icon.

WOOD7 Autograph Sticker

Adriano “WOOD7” Cerato integrated a picture of the animated character Woody Woodpecker into his nickname on his Paris 2023 Sticker.

Grim Autograph Sticker

Michael “Grim” Wince from Complexity Gaming depicted a scythe of a Grim Reaper on his Paris 2023 Autograph Sticker.

Sico Autograph Sticker

Simon “Sico” Williams from Grayhound added a reference to Travis Scott’s “Sico Mode” song to his Paris Major Player Autograph Sticker.

Wrapping Up!

The anticipated BLAST.tv Paris CS:GO Major 2023 is almost here, and we are ready to witness the best line-ups entering the battlefield to compete for the $1,250,000 prize pool and the historic title of the last CS:GO Major Champions. Are you?
Cheer for your favorite team in Paris and check our blog for more articles about CS:GO skins and other cosmetic items, in-depth game guides, and esports news. Stay tuned!
